title: MPPGCL Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 226 Apprentices Posts
description: The Madhya Pradesh Power Generation Company Limited (MPPGCL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 226 Graduate Apprentices, Diploma Apprentices, and Trade Apprentices. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, B.E./B. Tech, Diploma, and ITI candidates can apply for the MPPGCL Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in onl...
